#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Prerequisites =

SharePoint Foundation 2010 / SharePoint 2010 Environment


= Step 1. WSP Installation =

Download WSP for 2010 and unzip the TreeView archive. This contains the WSP file and power shell scripts files to retract and install.

= 2010 Installation =

1. Right click on PackageDeploy.ps1 file and click "Run with PowerShell" 


2. IF you have already installed this solution before; then you will be given 3 options : 

 Retract and Install solution

 Upgrade Solution

 Exit 


3. In this demo, I opted for 1st option
